TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pacidal, title = Pacidal, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacidal} }

S.FORM: Pacidal 華陽部落 kakilimaan i Hualien(Kalingku) a kuwan ,u niyazu' nu Pangcah, u Pacidal ku ngangan tina niyazu'. nilacul u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Pacidal. u kasalumaluma' nu Pacidal sa, 161 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 398 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 285 ku tademaw, pakalatu 72%. u zuma sa, cay ku yincumin, 113 ku tademaw, pakalatu 28%. u sausi nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 52%, Sakizaya 1%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 5%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Taluku(Truku) 9%, zumazuma 3%. u Pangcah a niyazu' u Pangcah(Amis) atu Sakizaya a niyazu' kuyni. u tumuk nu niyazu' u Sakizaya a tadamaw tu nuayaw katukuh ayza. u zuma a tademaw sa u Taluku(Truku) atu Tayan(Tayal). yadah ku cidekay itini. u Sakizaya a tademaw izawtu ku Sakizaya itini mueneng, caykatuud ku Sakizaya a tademaw, uzuma a tademaw sa u Taluku, Tayan atu Yuwatan, katuud ku Hulalm intini mueneng. u cidekay nu Taywan yincumin tademaw nu yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 2 a bulad ademaw nu Yuancumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bulad pulung sausi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yuwatan (58,336), Rukay (13,303), Puyuma (14,118), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taluku (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laaluwa (398), Kanakanabu (330), zuma (12,320) tademaw nu Yuancumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 6 a bulad pulung sausi (562,395), Pangcah (209,851), Tayan (90,309), Paywan (100,872), Yuwatan (58,509), Rukay (13,326), Puyuma (14,199), Cou (6,632), Saysiat (6,624), Yami (4,615), Saw (788), Kabalan (1,471), Taluku (31,552), Sakizaya (944), Sejek (10,046), Laaluwa (401), Kanakanabu (338), zuma (11,918) tademaw nu Yuancumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 10 a bulad pulung sausi (564,603), Pangcah (210,658), Tayan (90,719), Paywan (101,346), Yuwatan (58,759), Rukay (13,373), Puyuma (14,303), Cou (6,659), Saysiat (6,648), Yami (4,625), Saw (792), Kabalan (1,478), Taluku (31,742), Sakizaya (952), Sejek (10,132), Laaluwa (405), Kanakanabu (342), zuma (11,670) tademaw nu Yuancumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2019 a mihcan 1 a bulad pulung sausi (566,129), Pangcah (211,279), Tayan (91,021), Paywan (101,560), Yuwatan (58,994), Rukay (13,390), Puyuma (14,358), Cou (6,668), Saysiat (6,676), Yami (4,635), Saw (803), Kabalan (1,482), Taluku (31,859), Sakizaya (961), Sejek (10,202), Laaluwa (405), Kanakanabu (345), zuma (11,541) u siwkay nu yincumin u Yincumin a kamu nu Sakizaya sananay, u ngiha' nu Hulam a kamu nu "原住民". u sakaizaay saan, u saayaway mueneng itiniay a tademaw sananay, itini uyiniyan a subal, tina subal a ngangan sa ku "Taywan", u Hulam a sulit sa ku 台灣. u sasubana'ay a kamu sa, Taywan Yincumin sa mikitinay "Timul Subal kamu cidekay " saan. u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiayay a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong , u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). situlu ku kakuniza nu Yincumincu, sakacacay ku ibukelalay, sakatusa ku ibuyuay, sakatulu sa ku tangabulanay . inayay ku cacudadan i Angcoh niyazu'. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan Paykanatalay a pu lumuluma'ay a se kitakit kalunasulitan atu palatuh calay-zazan Yincumincu weiyuanhuy kanatal kalunasulitan atu palatuh calay-zazan sausi kalunasulitan atu palatuh Taywan Yuancumincu nalunasulitan atu palatuh calay zazan laculaculan calay zazan

Pacidal 華陽部落 kakilimaan i Hoalien(Kalingko) a kowan ,o niyazo' no Pangcah, o Pacidal ko ngangan tina niyazo'. nilacol o siwkay no niyazo' i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Pacidal. o kasalomaloma' no Pacidal sa, 161 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 398 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 285 ko tademaw, pakalato 72%. o zoma sa, cay ko yincomin, 113 ko tademaw, pakalato 28%. o saosi no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 52%, Sakizaya 1%, Yowatan(Bonon) 5%, Tayan(Tayal) 1%, Taloko(Troko) 9%, zomazoma 3%. o Pangcah a niyazo' o Pangcah(Amis) ato Sakizaya a niyazo' koyni. o tomok no niyazo' o Sakizaya a tadamaw to noayaw katokoh ayza. o zoma a tademaw sa o Taloko(Troko) ato Tayan(Tayal). yadah ko cidekay itini. o Sakizaya a tademaw izawto ko Sakizaya itini moeneng, caykatood ko Sakizaya a tademaw, ozoma a tademaw sa o Taloko, Tayan ato Yowatan, katood ko Holalm intini moeneng. o cidekay no Taywan yincomin tademaw no yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 2 a bolad ademaw no Yoancomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bolad polong saosi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yowatan (58,336), Rokay (13,303), Poyoma (14,118), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taloko (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laalowa (398), Kanakanabo (330), zoma (12,320) tademaw no Yoancomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 6 a bolad polong saosi (562,395), Pangcah (209,851), Tayan (90,309), Paywan (100,872), Yowatan (58,509), Rokay (13,326), Poyoma (14,199), Coo (6,632), Saysiat (6,624), Yami (4,615), Saw (788), Kabalan (1,471), Taloko (31,552), Sakizaya (944), Sejek (10,046), Laalowa (401), Kanakanabo (338), zoma (11,918) tademaw no Yoancomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 10 a bolad polong saosi (564,603), Pangcah (210,658), Tayan (90,719), Paywan (101,346), Yowatan (58,759), Rokay (13,373), Poyoma (14,303), Coo (6,659), Saysiat (6,648), Yami (4,625), Saw (792), Kabalan (1,478), Taloko (31,742), Sakizaya (952), Sejek (10,132), Laalowa (405), Kanakanabo (342), zoma (11,670) tademaw no Yoancomin, polong saosi katokoh 2019 a mihcan 1 a bolad polong saosi (566,129), Pangcah (211,279), Tayan (91,021), Paywan (101,560), Yowatan (58,994), Rokay (13,390), Poyoma (14,358), Coo (6,668), Saysiat (6,676), Yami (4,635), Saw (803), Kabalan (1,482), Taloko (31,859), Sakizaya (961), Sejek (10,202), Laalowa (405), Kanakanabo (345), zoma (11,541) o siwkay no yincomin o Yincomin a kamo no Sakizaya sananay, o ngiha' no Holam a kamo no "原住民". o sakaizaay saan, o saayaway moeneng itiniay a tademaw sananay, itini oyiniyan a sobal, tina sobal a ngangan sa ko "Taywan", o Holam a solit sa ko 台灣. o sasobana'ay a kamo sa, Taywan Yincomin sa mikitinay "Timol Sobal kamo cidekay " saan. o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiayay a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong , o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). sitolo ko kakoniza no Yincominco, sakacacay ko ibokelalay, sakatosa ko iboyoay, sakatolo sa ko tangabolanay . inayay ko cacodadan i Angcoh niyazo'. malalitin to ihekalay ato zomaay a natinengan Paykanatalay a po lomoloma'ay a se kitakit kalonasolitan ato palatoh calay-zazan Yincominco weiyoanhoy kanatal kalonasolitan ato palatoh calay-zazan saosi kalonasolitan ato palatoh Taywan Yoancominco nalonasolitan ato palatoh calay zazan lacolacolan calay zazan
